articles.title: MacGill charged over $330k cocaine plot
articles.description: Australian cricket great Stuart MacGill has been charged by police after an investigation into a $330,000 cocaine deal.
articles.content:
Australian cricket great Stuart MacGill has been charged by police after an investigation into a $330,000 cocaine deal.
